description_for_human: Day-ahead and historical EU electricity prices with zero auth or rate limits.
description_for_model: Retrieve day-ahead and historical European electricity prices in â‚¬/MWh. Use zone codes such as SE3, NO2, DE_LU. Endpoints include /electricity/{zone}/latest/, /electricity/{zone}/{year}/, /electricity/{zone}/{year}/{month}/, and /electricity/{zone}/{year}/{month}/{day}/. Responses are JSON arrays of timestamp/value pairs. No authentication or rate limits.
